= MUX CHEAT! =

1. `-[ : copy-mode
2. `-w : list-windows
3. `-d : detach
4. `-| : split vertically
5. `-- : split horizontally
6. `-o : swap panes
7. `-z : zoom pane
8. `-<space> : toggle pane layouts
9. `-` : type `
10. `-k : Kill Pane
11. C-hjkl : move panes
12. `-[ : scroll mode


= WIKI CHEAT! =
== Keys ==
  1. gll : increase list depth
  2. gLl : increase list depth + include children
  3. glh : decrease list depth
  4. gLh : decrease list depth + include children
  5. [ ] <C-Space> : add checkbox & toggle state
  6. gl<space> : remove checkboxes

== Motions ==

  1. ah/ih : around/in heading
  2. al : list item + children
  3. il : single list item
